menuSections.title: Burgers
menuSections.description: All burgers include cos lettuce, red onions & tomatoes. Add fries £1.39, curly fries £1.79 & sweet potato fries £2.29 extra are available

menuItems.title: Common Guy Burger
menuItems.description: Classic beef patty served with American cheese, lettuce, onions, tomato & ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun

menuItems.title: Classic Chicken Burger
menuItems.description: Classic chicken fillet burger served with lettuce & mayo on a toasted sesame bun

menuItems.title: Deluxe Cheeseburger
menuItems.description: Beef patty, beef stock, cheese spread, monetary jack cheese & halo sauce

menuItems.title: Veggie Burger
menuItems.description: Classic vegetarian burger with American cheese & mayo

menuItems.title: Chicken Supreme Burger
menuItems.description: Chicken fillet with crispy smoked bacon, onion rings, classic American cheese & mayo

menuItems.title: Jack Daniel"s Burger
menuItems.description: Beef patty, Jack Daniel"s glaze, monetary jack cheese & smoked bacon

menuItems.title: Mexican Burger
menuItems.description: Chicken fillet, monetary jack cheese, hot salsa, nachos, jalapenos & guacamole

menuItems.title: Smoke House Burger
menuItems.description: Beef patty topped with BBQ pulled pork, monetary jack cheese, smoked crispy bacon, pickled onions & BBQ sauce

menuItems.title: Halo Burger
menuItems.description: Combination of both chicken, beef & bacon, combined with American cheese, fried onions all topped off with our deluxe Halo special sauce

menuItems.title: Jack Daniel"s Chicken Burger
menuItems.description: Chicken fillet, jack Daniel"s glaze, monetary jack cheese & smoked bacon

menuSections.title: Wraps
menuSections.description: Add fries £1.39, curly fries £1.79 & sweet potato fries £2.29 extra are available

menuItems.title: Mexican Wrap
menuItems.description: Chicken fillet with American cheese, hot salsa, nachos, jalapenos & guacamole

menuItems.title: Halo Wrap
menuItems.description: Chicken fillet, extra crispy smoked bacon, double American cheese, sizzling onions & smothered in our deluxe Halo special sauce
